column3:
“I purchased a 1/2 oz. of Hell Raiser Og today from the best delivery service in south orange ca, Blue Bird, and I am impressed by the freshness and aromas wafting up my rather large, ( according to my wife) nostrils.  
The Leafly overview is quite accurate, so I'll move on to the experience I am having.
I ground up two nice little buds for a small solo joint, rolled in one Elements ultra thin rice papers.  Please for...”

“I am writing this review to rectify a rather lame review I penned about a year ago concerning Hell Raiser Og.
This is some very fine herb. I have a long history of medical marijuana usage, (61 years old, 40+ years of smoking), and have had my medical license since 2002 here in California, thus I have had the good fortune to have been exposed to the finest varieties of medical grade strains in my lifetime, for I try t...”

“Great taste.
I would describe it as an indica dominant hybrid. Similar to Blue Dream; but more heavy on the indica side.”
“Really great strain, very relaxing and heavy”
“I have never been picky with weed. This is by far my all time favorite. It makes me happy and giggle a lot. Gives me enough energy and focus to complete projects instead of stare at them;)”
“just good bud. had my head floatin.  my head felt so good.”
“Loving the piney terps on this heavy strain got hints of lemon aswel sticks fluffy buds make for great Jay's”
“This has been by far the best stain for my lower back pain. Taste great and not too harsh.”
“Loving the piney terps on this heavy strain got hints of lemon aswel sticks fluffy buds make for great Jay's”
“Picked up some before Halloween horror nights . Had massive energy and a good high that lasted a bit that made the monsters seem even more scary . .”
“A bedtime remedy.”
“Pleasant surprise great taste and super super dense buds!”

“Firm, lettuce green buds with lots of mango orange pistils & the trichomes are so many they are almost falling of the buds. Flavors & scents are a sour citrus & woody pine. This 60/40 Hybrid's effects are uplifting, energizing, happy, & relaxing. Protect The Harvest.....”
“Indica dominant hybrid, feels like your ideal indica that’s not too strong or too weak.”
“Very potent strain, not for light weights”

“This is my favorite strain as I am a neophyte in the medical cannabis world. This will is a great day time sativa. I feel that the effects last about 4 hours maybe more. I can still be myself. Pain is reduced a little. Stress, anxietyb and depression gets quieted down. I say this greatly helps common conditions like the ones I mentioned, though it may not totally eradicate anything. This makes life more manageable wi...”

“a fun strain to have for socializing! smoked myself + friends up with this at a music festival & felt talkative, chill  & cloudy headed. also ingested by means of a firecracker right before going to six flags & felt very silly & unfocused, it was great. that was probably my favorite way to take this strain, i recommend it. 
personally this is not my top choice for smoking & chilling by yourself tho, i would end up fe...”
“Hella good”

“good stuff.. don't let name fool you 
its heavy but super relaxing good.. for just chilling at home.. or hanging with friends..”

“Classic OG. Strong skunky odor. Great flavor. Long lasting, relaxing, and euphoric smoke.
A+”
“Very Talkative.....”
“Stupid fire flower for even dumber donations even if it was popcorn it was just as sticky phyre”
“One the original fire strains this stink just reeks of gasoline and lemon terps made for some heavy smoke last nite”
“Stoney medication 420/10”
“Very mellow and functional strain. I love the pine-herbal taste, which is the best part, it's also a little sweet as well.”

“I really enjoy this strain and so do my homies. but im curios if the thc percent is correct. it says it is 33.5% thc whatever it is its amazing and definitely our go to when we dont wanna try something new. c:”

“It has the potential to be my go-to-strain for mid day vaping.  Its not quite a wake-and-bake, more like a pre luncher.  Its not super kushy, hits of lemon and musky but a very neutral flavor.  We called this shit Chronic growing up. Almost a perfect mid day picker upper. My flower was grown great, lots of resin and sticky brittle nugs. The cracking sound when I broke it down was something to see and hear.  I think t...”
“superb”
“Nice !”
“good high :)”

“Hell Raiser OG

Lineage: Fire OG x Face Off OG (Bx1)

What can I say it glistens under the normal flashlight on my iPhone. The Fire OG cutting by OG Raskal had already made a name for itself, so ThaDocta of Archive Seeds bred his Face Off OG with this esteemed specimen to create a next generation of Kush Hybrids. One of the best strains of 2014, hard and heavy caked in trichs! A must have for any veteran.”
“Been there done that:)”
